translations: [植] 梨果（由子房和花托发育而成的果实，如苹果、梨等）

sentences.sentence: Various other pome fruits can produce palatable drinks.
sentences.translation: 其他各种梨果也可以制成可口的饮料。

sentences.sentence: Pome for the large, mainly white areas in Shenyang, has long enjoyed a good reputation pepper.
sentences.translation: 梨果为大宗，主要分布在阳白地区，花椒也久负盛名。

sentences.sentence: A new parameter estimation method (POMELM) based on POME and L-moment is proposed in the thesis.
sentences.translation: 在此基础上提出一种基于线性矩法的熵估计方法(POMELM)。
